description: Colorful status line with ANSI color codes for enhanced visual appeal. Uses colors to distinguish between different information types: blue for model, green for directory, yellow for git branch.

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); BRANCH=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then BRANCH=" | \033[33m🌿 $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)\033[0m"; fi; echo "\033[34m[$MODEL]\033[0m \033[32m📁 ${DIR##*/}\033[0m$BRANCH"'
